availabilityText: Open to Information Systems, Systems Analyst, Data Analyst, and IT Administrator roles

title: Hi, I'm David!
introText: I'm an Information Systems and Data Analyst who also works as an IT Administrator, with a Masterâ€™s degree in Computer Science and over 9 years supporting academic IT environments, data-driven operations, and enterprise-style reporting workflows. I also run hands-on home-lab scenarios with enterprise switching, VLAN configuration, IP addressing, and isolated test environments.
